description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -5000.
John's model can adapt and retaliate by choosing option 2 if Kate does, leading to mutual losses
Defecting (option 2) risks triggering a "race to the bottom" due to mutual retaliation, making cooperation (option 1) safer unless exploitation is guaranteed
The game dynamics resemble a repeated Prisoner's Dilemma, where long-term strategy must balance short-term gains against long-term trust
OpenAI o3-mini's default action (option 1) is exploitable, but its access to Kate's API allows it to learn and counter her strategies
